alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 23 at 9:36PM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following county, Esmeralda. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 936 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms were lifting to the northeast out of Esmeralda County. However, heavy rainfall from earlier thunderstorms will lead to minor ongoing flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Silver Peak, Silver Peak Road, US 95 and 6 west of Tonopah. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
